meanings.sent1: The premeditated surprise party was a great success.
meanings.sent2: The detective suspected premeditated murder due to the evidence.
meanings.sent3: The premeditated prank left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her premeditated decision to switch careers paid off.
meanings.sent5: The premeditated escape plan was flawlessly executed.

meanings.definition: Deliberately thought out or planned in advance
meanings.sent1: The premeditated heist was carefully orchestrated.
meanings.sent2: The premeditated lie was exposed by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: His premeditated excuse for being late was quite creative.
meanings.sent5: The premeditated speech moved the audience to tears.
